title: The Great Old One
content:
rmour Proficiency Simple Weapon Proficiency Choose 2 Skill Proficiencies Pact Magic

The Great Old One is a Subclass of Warlock in Baldur's Gate 3. The Great Old One's primary ability is Charisma, their saving throw proficiencies are Wisdom & Charisma and they have a Hit Dice of 1d8. They have proficiency with Simple weapons and with Light Armour.

Warlocks bound to eldritch beings in the Far Realms work towards inscrutable goals, gaining strange powers over entropy and the mind.
